Articles.Content: Since my entire fleet got destroyed by those space marines and legothingies and megatiger, I assemble a rag tag flotilla and launches a salted bomb attack on _Augustus_'s hill/planet, Putto, killing all ground personnel and disabling automated defences. I send hazmat teams to recover all your technology blueprints to build that Zero Point Module you had in plan to create, and use its power to create a hill on a planet in the far reaches of the Andromeda galaxy, in the outer rim. There, I set up another shipyard where I could build many warships and groups of fighters. This hill is protected by a shield so powerful that even Big Bang or interdimensional..whatever has no effect on the hill itself.

Hype ball again. It has too much momentum to be stopped (from destroying your shipyard).
